org.afree.chart.plot.dial

Class DialPointer.Pin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.plot.dial.AbstractDialLayer
      • org.afree.chart.plot.dial.DialPointer
        • org.afree.chart.plot.dial.DialPointer.Pin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, DialLayer
    Enclosing class:
    DialPointer

    public static class DialPointer.Pin
extends DialPointer
    A dial pointer that draws a thin line (like a pin).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
